name: general
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: general
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: involving or relating to most or all people, things, or places, especially when these are considered as a unit

example.eg: The general feeling is that justice was not served.
example.egtrans: 普遍的看法是这样做没有达成公平合理。

example.eg: There is general concern about rising crime rates.
example.egtrans: 人们普遍对犯罪率上升感到担忧。

example.eg: My general impression of the place was good.
example.egtrans: 我对这个地方总的印象很好。

example.eg: The talk is intended to be of general interest (= of interest to most people).
example.egtrans: 这次商谈是要探讨大家普遍感兴趣的话题。

example.eg: Rain will become more general in the southeast during the afternoon.
example.egtrans: 降雨范围将在下午进一步扩展到东南地区。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 一般来说；通常；在一般情况下

example.eg: In general, men are taller than women.
example.egtrans: 一般来说，男人个子比女人高。

example.eg: As a general rule, we don't allow children in the bar.
example.egtrans: 一般情况下，我们不允许儿童进入酒吧。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: considering the whole of someone or something, and not just a particular part of him, her, or it

example.eg: So, apart from the bad ankle, how are you in general?
example.egtrans: 那么，除了踝部的伤病，你身体总的来说怎么样？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be a good thing for the public
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 对大多数人有好处；符合公众利益

example.eg: The government will only say it is not in the general interest to reveal any more information.
example.egtrans: 政府只能说，透露更多的信息有损公众的利益。

dsense.name: general
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: not detailed, but including the most basic or necessary information

example.eg: What he said was very general.
The school aims to give children a general background in a variety of subjects.
example.egtrans: 学校旨在向孩子们概要介绍各种学科的背景知识。

example.eg: I'm not an expert, so I can only speak in general terms on this matter.
example.egtrans: 我不是专家，我只能泛泛地谈这个问题。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: things considered as a unit and without giving attention to details
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 一般事物；大致情况，总体情况

example.eg: His book moves from the general to the particular.
example.egtrans: 他的书先介绍总体情况然后探讨具体问题。

dsense.name: general
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: including a lot of things or subjects and not limited to only one or a few
trans_examp.trans_cn: 一般性的；普通的；非专门的

trans_examp.trans_en: used as part of the title of a job of someone who is in charge of a whole organization or company
trans_examp.trans_cn: （用于头衔中，表示负责整个组织或公司）总管的，首席的，全面负责的

example.eg: the General Secretary of the UN

name: general
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an officer of very high rank, especially in the army

example.eg: He was promoted to the rank of general.

example.egtrans: 布朗将军／罗杰·布朗将军
